QuestData.Title: Grand Master Rohok
QuestData.Description: The symbol on the key's handle... it is hard to make it out inside the mold, but I recognize it as the Shattered Hand's own.$B$BThere is a good chance this key will allow you to enter the Shattered Halls.$B$BSpeak to Rohok, our resident blacksmith. If anyone can forge this key it is he.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Primed Key Mold to Rohok at Thrallmar in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.RewardText: Nazgrel wants me to work on a key? Does he forget we're in a battlefield? There are blades and spears to forge!
